name: Potato Leek Soup I
author: JJOHN32
summary: A rich potato soup with NO milk or cream. Garnish with fresh parsley.
ingredients: 5 pounds white potatoes, peeled and quartered
¼ teaspoon freshly ground white pepper
directions: Cook potatoes in chicken stock until soft
Put potatoes in the work bowl of a food processor in batches
Add 5 cups of chicken stock from the potato cooking pot
Half the leeks lengthwise, and soak in water to clean
Add white wine, and cook for 3 minutes
In a soup pot, combine remaining cup of chicken stock from the potato cooking pot and sauteed leeks
Stir in pureed potatoes, and bring to a simmer
Season with salt and white pepper
Cook to desired consistency, adding more stock if necessary
